title: Judgment on Jeroboam and Rehoboam
summary: Jeroboam’s son becomes ill, and his wife seeks a prophecy. The prophet Ahijah announces judgment on Jeroboam’s house. Meanwhile, Judah under Rehoboam also turns to idolatry, and God allows Egypt to invade.

faq.question: What prophecy was given about Jeroboam’s family?
faq.answer: That his dynasty would be cut off because of his idolatry.

faq.question: What happened to Judah under Rehoboam?
faq.answer: They fell into sin, and Egypt plundered the temple and palace.
